name: cam_import_by_name
label: CAM Import Cloud Resources
description: Data structure describing the attributes required to run a resource import REST API against Cloud Automation Manager

attributes.name: cam_cloudconnection_name
attributes.description: Name of the CAM cloud connection used to connect to the cloud where the instance is going to be imported from
attributes.label: CAM Cloud Connection Name

attributes.name: cam_template_name
attributes.description: Name of the CAM import template used as a base for terraform import
attributes.label: CAM Import Template Name

attributes.name: cam_template_version_name
attributes.description: Name of the CAM import template version used as a base for terraform import
attributes.label: CAM Import Template Version Name
